sentences.sContent: Ken had an accident at work and had to go to hospital.
sentences.sCn: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.sContent: I’m sorry about breaking the vase – it was an accident (=  I did not intend to do it  ) .
sentences.sCn: 对不起，我把花瓶打碎了——这是个意外。

sentences.sContent: She was injured in a freak accident (=  an unusual accident  ) when a wall suddenly collapsed.
sentences.sCn: 她在一场墙壁突然倒塌的诡异事故中受了伤。

sentences.sContent: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.sCn: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.sContent: They lost their lives in a tragic accident .
sentences.sCn: 他们在一次悲惨的事故中丧生。
